alert.note: Alert for Northwest Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 12 at 1:57PM MST until February 14 at 11:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING ABOVE 4000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible above 4000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Northwest Plateau including Colorado City. * WHEN...From early Tuesday morning through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Periods of heavy snowfall and strong winds could result in hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility and accumulations on roadways across northern Mohave County.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant snow accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.
